summary: After failing their exam, Jean-Pierre and Alain are sent to England. But all they want are girls.
cast: Rémi Laurent|Stéphane Hillel|Véronique Delbourg|Sophie Barjac|Julie Neubert|Rynagh O'Grady|Aïna Wallé|Brigitte Bellac|Michel Melki|Béatrice Saint-Marc|Marc Chouppart|Pierre Pradinas|Frédéric Pieretti|Eric Deacon|David Morris|Caroline Beaune|Catherine Bosne|Corinne Corson|Françoise Engel|Daniel Gaudry|Gisele Gimenez|Ana-Maria Guanse|Dominique Le Roy|Béatrice Lord|Fenella Maguire|Martine Sarcey
title: ¡Para nosotros, las inglesitas!
